author: Ted Byrne
content: Holy Moly Batman! This is great! A masterpiece of frozen time. And the palette... WHOOOOO EEEE! You've made this appear so easy to do... But then again the Olympic Ice skater's smile makes what she just accomplished look, well, everyday normal. Yet this clearly isn't. So many years of craft mastery allowed you to imagine this to me Andreas. Thanks... BTW, your image is up, hope it's acceptable. Happy New Year to you and Irene.
